answerText: brinicles [or brine icicle; or ice stalactite][10] Brinicles were filmed for the first time on BBC's Frozen Planet series, near this continent that is mostly covered by ice.
heading: Penn Bowl |2014 | 12 | 7 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These ocean formations are thought to form by the same principles that underly "chemical gardens". For 10 points each: [10] Name these awesome, spindly formations that extend from overlying sea ice into the ocean's depths, being driven by a salt differential and freezing point difference.
